Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: MIDDLE KINGDOM (not after); 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before)
Name: Vase
Description: Biconical vase with a rounded base. Three horizontal lines are incised on the upper part of the body. The lip is wide, flat and has a slight swell on its exterior. Just below the lip are four small perforations for the suspension of the vessel.
